title: Husires
author: Husires
created_time: June 23, 2022, 07:01:58 PMLast edit: August 10, 2022, 10:31:45 PM by Husires
content: My friend has some exercise that he would like to solve and found it on Chegg. he needs it only for the day.so, instead of paying the monthly subscription, I offer you a small donation in exchange for sending a screen shot/google drive for the answers.The task is easy, so if you have a paid account, I will send you a question link and send me answers and select the value of the donation that you want to get (in bitcoin or lightning network)

comments.author: Jemzx00
comments.body: This suggestion might be late or even your friend might not even need it anymore but I'll say it anyways. You can try posting your Chegg link on Reddit as there are some groups there that will accept payment per question. Also, you can try to check out this website as it provide a screenshot of the answer for your activities or exams that is available on the Chegg website. The website is  homeworkify, I've using this website as reference for solutions on some exams. Not all answer or solution is available on the website especially if there's no answer to unblur on you chegg link.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Bump, need it again will PM you Chegg link/s and need screens. 4$ after get all I want.

comments.author: Killredillla
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on August 10, 2022, 10:33:12 PMBump, need it again will PM you Chegg link/s and need screens. 4$ after get all I want.Does it have to be solved using Chegg ? Can't you just post the task here and see if someone specializing in that field can help you?
